io.smooch.core

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smooch.core.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Object representing a received or sent message
    See Also:

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String text,
               java.lang.String payload,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> metadata)
        Create a message with the given text, payload, and metadata. The message will be owned by the current user.
        Parameters:
        text - The text
        payload - The message payload
        metadata - The message metadata (JSON Object)
